branding.tagline: Delve into the fabric of fantasy

publishing_focus.primary_focus: Fantasy stories built on mythology and folklore
publishing_focus.target_audience: Readers with an interest in mythology and tales of old, reimagined
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: We leverage the timeless appeal of folklore and mythology in a modern context
publishing_focus.example_titles: Comparable to works by Rick Riordan or Madeline Miller
